alert.note: Alert for Panola (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 9:31AM CDT until September 07 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Panola County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 931 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Deberry, or 11 miles east of Carthage, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carthage, Midyett, Deadwood, Front and Woods. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
